titles.title: Making appropriations for military construction, the Department of Veterans Affairs, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2020, and for other purposes.
Military Construction, Veterans Affairs, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2020

action.text: The House Committee on Appropriations reported an original measure, H. Rept. 116-63, by Ms. Wasserman Schultz.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 40.
